title: what the hell rito
body: can someone help me understand why my league has been scanning files for 3 hours and is up to 12000 and it's still going??? what the helll {{champion:63}} this is pissing me off

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sorry this is happening, when the launcher is scanning for issues it will run until it finds a problem file and then start from the beginning again, we recommend you allow this to run until completion.
